Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, archaea-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (81.82%) tosynthetic PaDBS1R6F8L: 20%, K: 40%, I=A=F=R: 10%.Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC 12600 or ATCC 25923 (MIC 32 uM) or greater, E. faecalis ATCC 19433 (MIC 4-8 uM), P. aeruginosa H1001 or PAO1 or PA14 (MIC 32-40 uM), and E. coli ATCC 25922 or KpC+ 001812446 or BL21 (MIC 4-32 uM), K-pneumoniae (MIC>32 uM), A-baumannii (MIC> 32 uM), and E-cloacae colistin resistant (MIC>32 uM).

Literature Information.Title: Short Cationic Peptide Derived from Archaea with Dual Antibacterial Properties and Anti-Infective Potential.
